prompt: Can I add a live translation app to calls?

hidden_queries: Can I add live translation app to phone calls live translation during calls how to do
ライブ通話 翻訳アプリ 通話中 翻訳 phone call live translation apps
metadata.generated_search_query: Can I add live translation app to phone calls live translation during calls how to do

sources.title: iOS 26: Translate Phone Calls in Real Time on iPhone
sources.snippet: In iOS 26, Apple's Live Translation feature can turn your iPhone into a real-time interpreter during phone calls.

citation_mappings.claim_text: Yes — you can add live translation to calls, but how you do it depends on your device and tools: 1) Built-in phone translation (no third-party app needed) iPhone (iOS 26+) now has a Live Translation feature inside the Phone app for real-time call translation. You make/receive a call, tap More → Live Translation, and the system translates speech both ways and can show text on screen. It works during one-on-one calls in supported languages and switches to speaker if not using headphones. MacRumors+1

sources.title: おすすめ電話通訳アプリ6選｜2025年版
sources.snippet: Live Translate（Google Pixel 8） 対応機種： Pixel 8 / 8 Pro Pixel 8シリーズに標準搭載されたLive Translateは、電話やメッセージ中の音声・テキストをリアルタイムで翻訳する機能です。 主な機能： 通話中のライブ翻訳： 会話中の音声をリアルタイムで文字起こし＆翻訳し、画面上に表示 Live Caption統合 ...

citation_mappings.claim_text: 2) Android options Some Android phones (e.g., Google Pixel, Samsung with latest UI/updates) include live translation features for phone calls that translate both sides as you talk; availability and languages vary by model and OS version. Aiphone+1

3) Third-party apps There are apps designed to translate calls or provide real-time translators for VoIP/Internet calls (e.g., dedicated call translator apps or services like EzDubs). These typically work by placing the call through the app or overlaying translation on top of normal calls. EzDubs

sources.title: ライブ翻訳アプリで失敗なし！無料と有料を徹底比較し用途別にベストな選び方を伝授 - ハウスケアラボ
sources.snippet: ライブ翻訳アプリは、音声認識→翻訳→音声合成までを数秒で処理し、会話を橋渡しします。 Googleは100以上の言語をサポートし、主要アプリはオフラインやカメラ翻訳にも対応します。 一方で、雑音や回線遅延が精度と反応速度を下げるのも事実。

citation_mappings.claim_text: Note: They often require you or the other party to use the app/service, may replace voices with a synthetic translator, and quality/lag vary. Key limitations to be skeptical about Not universal on all phones — built-in live call translation is new and limited to certain devices/OS versions. May need Internet or data unless the phone’s on-device translation supports offline. Accuracy and lag — live translation isn’t perfect; background noise and accents affect quality. lifestyle.assist-all.co.jp
